mapinfo.detailstext:
The malaysian peninsula is surrounded by two oceans that brings substantial natural resources such as whales and fishes. 
 Trees are rather scarce but are a natural wall that should help you to defend your base. You should find some buffalos which are scattered in this region.
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Jesuit / Sufi 
 -Outlaws: Wokou Pirate / Marathan Dacoit
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Rikikipu 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
mapinfo.loadDetailsText:
The malaysian peninsula is surrounded by two oceans that brings substantial natural resources such as whales and fishes. 
 Trees are rather scarce but are a natural wall that should help you to defend your base. You should find some buffalos which are scattered in this region.
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Jesuit / Sufi 
 -Mercenaries: Wokou Pirate / Marathan Dacoit
 
 ---------------------------------
